title: Forum Posting
body: It says on the forum that i can comment unless I'm level 6 or higher. I am level 30 for months now. Given this is first time i wanted to comment or post things. How do i fix it?

replies.body: Well nvm. It got fixed. Thank you though.

Hey SMN Prime,

The level reflected on the Boards is updated after you post somewhere on the Boards! Since you've posted this thread, your level was updated to level 30, and you should now be able to comment on posts! :D Welcome to the Boards, by the way!
It won't let me comment at all.
